normalized: i was standing completely motionless, while lurking in the shadows.
the sun had set below the horizon and a comfortable darkness had descended.
the time of humans was over.
now, it was the time of the people of the night.
the dim light in the sky was being pushed back gently by the encroaching darkness.
the plaza had become enveloped in a pale-blue light.
a woman stepped out of that pale-blue light.
her steps were so light and gentle that she was making no sound whatsoever.
her flowing mantle was fluttering at her feet.
what a pleasant night.
the woman looked up and narrowed her eyes, as if she was basking in the pleasant moonlight.
her appearance was so beautiful that it seemed like it was the goddess of the moon herself, who had descended from the heavens down to the earth.
swish…
the beautiful woman began to walk over the ground steadily, which had been imbued with the pale-blue light.
she was walking over the ground majestically, as if she had been endowed with a refined elegance.
swish…
she was teeming with such divine beauty that no ordinary person could even dare to approach her.
she drew near.
swish… swish…
i made an exaggerated hand-signal to the people around me, while taking care to not make a sound.
fufu… looks like i am done being bored.
the woman came to a halt.
the shadows on the ground disappeared.
the darkness deepened.
the scent of inhuman beasts had engulfed the area.
this is what i had been waiting for.
i approached the woman from her front, with a smile of contempt etched across my face.

name: gram
normalized: it has been a while, blood lord.
your majesty, the queen cara cromwell.

name: cara
normalized: nhaa!?
uncle… gram…!?

name: gram
normalized: that's right.
your uncle, gram derrick.

name: cara
normalized: why are you…?
that was it.
that was exactly the kind of astonished expression which i had wanted to see on her face.

name: gram
normalized: there isn't even a need to ask why now, is there?
you killed me and i was resurrected, just like in the stories.
after all, that is what we, vampires, do.

name: cara
normalized: that isn't how it is supposed to be.
after all, no matter what breed of vampire it is, you can kill it for good by slicing its head off.
the queen was no longer calm as before and the expression on her face had reverted back to an icy-cold one, which was more than enough to freeze her enemies in fear.
indeed.
she had had a similar expression on her face that time as well.
in the end, she had raided my organization and beheaded me, by slicing my head off without any hesitation, even though i was her kin.
she had possessed such icy-cold eyes at the time that it had seemed completely natural for her to do so.

name: gram
normalized: in the meanwhile, let me offer you my gratitude.

name: cara
normalized: hmph… so, have you come here to get beheaded by my hand once again, uncle?

name: gram
normalized: that won't be the case this time.
you are too stupid of a queen to wander around without an escort.
the tranquil plaza, which had been imbued with the pale-blue light, was getting tainted by a dark aura.
the area was being engulfed in an aura of bloodlust.

name: cara
normalized: 20… no, about 30, is it?
my subordinates had come forth and were standing in front of cara.
all my subordinates were brawny delinquents and the dwellers of darkness.
the aroused men were glaring at her through their ferocious eyes, with drool dangling out of their mouths.

name: cara
normalized: even if you do eliminate me, nothing will change.

name: gram
normalized: are you really begging me to spare your life now?

name: cara
normalized: that is the truth though.

name: gram
normalized: do you really believe that?

name: gram
normalized: this world needs my business.
if your huge yet disturbing stranglehold on power is severed, then this world will be allowed to be consumed by corruption very soon.

name: cara
normalized: what nonsense.

name: gram
normalized: that isn't nonsense, that is the truth.
our vampiric blood is like a drug to humans.
all of them crave it so desperately that they are willing to sell their very souls for it.

name: gram
normalized: we provide them with it and, as compensation, they offer us humans to feed on.

name: cara
normalized: drinking the blood of a human is a grave violation of the treaty.

name: gram
normalized: shut up!
that treaty is nothing but an annoyance!
the conflict between the humans and the vampires had been going on for ages.
the humans and us, vampires, had been clashing at every given opportunity.
until about 100 years ago, when this cowardly peace-treaty had been established and enforced.
obviously, one of the ridiculous clauses of this treaty was that the vampires were forbidden from sucking on the blood of humans.
my organization had been a den which was infamous for violating this treaty.
we would receive humans from other depraved humans and we would suck on their blood, or even train them as slaves before selling them off to other vampires.
as a result, the queen had crushed it by her own hand.

name: cara
normalized: if you continue to violate the treaty, then the humans will rise up against us and retaliate.
you are merely going to lead us, vampires, to our destruction.

name: gram
normalized: kuku… there won't be any retaliation on their part.
the depraved humans in positions of power are open-minded enough, especially when it comes to my business.
once i provided them with vampiric blood── amrita, and they experienced its potent effects, they would willingly come to me for more, especially the affluent ones.
after all, all humans found vampiric blood to be seductively sweet.

name: cara
normalized: … do you intend to continue with such inhuman acts, regardless of their consequences?

name: gram
normalized: don't make me laugh by labelling them as inhuman.
what are vampires unless we suck on the lifeblood of humans!?
as our ruler, you should be ashamed at having cast off our pride!

name: cara
normalized: well then, looks like i am left with no choice.
i am going to kill my boredom, by taking your head once again.

name: gram
normalized: kukuku… even though you are the queen, you can't hope to do anything all alone.
i am going to make you regret this!

name: cara
normalized: you will be the one to regret this.

name: gram
normalized: i am going to make you wallow in pure agony, by ripping your limbs off and raping you to death!
you will die filled with regret that you even dared to crush my organization and murder me!

name: cara
normalized: even though you are my kin, you are also an outlaw who has disturbed the order.
this is the decree of your queen!
a dozen of my subordinates rushed at cara simultaneously.

name: cara
normalized: fufu
the queen's face was completely composed.

name: gram
normalized: … what is that?
the space behind cara distorted.
in that moment, the mantle, which she was wearing, began to flutter.

name: cara
normalized: spears of the black mist.

name: gram
normalized: whaat!?
dozens of blades.
i managed to catch a momentary glimpse at them, under the pale moonlight.
their tips were so sharp that they could easily rip one's skin to shreds, if merely grazed by them.
all those spears were unleashed simultaneously, as if they had been aimed at striking her prey.
those deadly spears had been forged out of a black mist, which the queen's mantle had transformed into.
this was the very same weapon that cara had used to kill me.
it was a cluster of numerous spears.

name: gram
normalized: all of them, at once!?
that can't be!
vampires could transform their own flesh and blood into weapons and armour.
however, it was usually limited to one, and two or three at most.
i could have digested that fact had they been tiny daggers, however, i couldn't believe how massive those blades were.
so much so that a strike from them could easily bore through someone, similar to a blow from the horns of a raging bull.

name: cara
normalized: move out.
they uncoiled like whips, and spread open in the shape of a spider's web──
before stretching out in our direction──
at the speed of lightning──

name: cara
normalized: penetrate them, my minions!

name: subordinates
normalized: guaah!?
」「ugaah!
」「gyaa!?
almost half of my subordinates were unable to dodge them, and they got skewered by them instantly.
however, they were all vampires as well.
they couldn't be killed unless their hearts were crushed or their heads sliced off──

name: cara
normalized: now then, it is time to feast.
both of cara's arms dissolved into the darkness,
as their flesh transformed into mist.
they swirled around in an indefinite form──
before swelling up.

name: cara
normalized: familiars of the fang.
the queen unleashed a couple of wolves.
they were as huge as bears.

name: gram
normalized: … together with the spears!?
were her powers limitless?
it was ridiculous to think that she had managed to transform both her arms into her familiars, after having unleashed numerous blades already.

name: cara
normalized: feast on them, my familiars!
the wolves charged in, while raising ferocious roars which tore through the air.
they were baring their huge fangs, which were so sharp that they could easily rip through a thick steel-frame.
they rushed through the air in a flash,
and pounced upon my skewered subordinates.
my subordinates were incapacitated.
they were unable to even raise screams in their death throes.
the wolves had snapped their ferocious jaws shut over them, which were like those of a man-eating shark, and their flesh, their bones and even their brains were devoured in an instant.
the filthy drool of the wolves got smeared over their bodies,
as they were broken and crushed.
a crimson-coloured fluid spurted out of the top of their necks, amidst the backdrop of the dark sky of the night.
their heads had already settled within the bellies of the huge wolves.
my subordinates transformed into mere lumps of meat, after having lost their heads, and they slumped over to the ground while convulsing bizarrely.
the ground, which had been imbued with the pale-blue light, became completely tainted by a sheen of their dark fluids.

name: cara
normalized: even though it is a lousy meal, please bear with it.
the monsters let out tremendous roars in response to cara's voice, after having swallowed the heads of my subordinates whole.
the number of my subordinates had already been halved.

name: gram
normalized: damn it…!
i had forged a sword in an instant and used it to block one of cara's spears, which had been aimed at my shoulder.
however, i had been unable to block even that strike, as my black blade was swiped out of my grasp causing it to fall down to the ground.
i recovered from that strike, by regenerating the flesh on my mutilated shoulder in an instant.
even so, i couldn't help but be astonished at the queen's overwhelming power.

name: gram
normalized: what is this power of yours!?

name: cara
normalized: this is my power, uncle.
the queen was staring at me with icy-cold eyes, after having restored her mantle back to its original form.
her eyes weren't like those of a human at all.
on the contrary, they looked like those of a serpent, as if the vampiress had set her eyes on her prey.

name: gram
normalized: is that despite you not having sucked on the lifeblood of a human…!?

name: cara
normalized: i haven't consumed the lifeblood of a single human, ever since i was born.

name: gram
normalized: ridiculous…!
it was possible for a vampire to survive, even if it didn't suck on the lifeblood of a human and merely consumed human food, just like any other ordinary human.
however, that wasn't the case when it came to the vampire's characteristic abilities.
if a vampire didn't consume any blood, then its ability to manipulate and shape its own flesh and blood would fade away.
that being the case, shouldn't it have been impossible for the queen to forge spears or create wolf familiars, as she didn't suck on blood?

name: cara
normalized: have you forgotten what my alias is?

name: gram
normalized: the blood lord── the one who lords over blood…!?
did the queen's power give her dominion over all the blood in existence!?

name: cara
normalized: if i can't manipulate my own flesh and blood without the need to suck on the lifeblood of others, then i can't really refer to myself as the ruler of all vampires now, can i?
that would merely make me a weakling… like you, uncle.

name: gram
normalized: shut up!
i won't be going easy on you this time!
i sicced my remaining subordinates on cara, and they ended up surrounding her.

name: gram
normalized: now, try fighting them all at once, while having to worry about your own back!
all of them pounced on her from every direction; left, right, front, back and even from above her; in order to completely smother her──
you really shouldn't be having so much fun without inviting me into the mix!
a long silvery-blue streak flashed out.

name: gram
normalized: what!?
the heads of my subordinates, who had managed to cut their way to the queen's backside, disappeared.
you're the queen of the vampires, aren't you?
a gruff-looking woman, who was holding a cigarette between her lips, came forth.
she was carrying a bat over her shoulder, which was shimmering with a pale-blue light.
no way!
is that…!?

name: cara
normalized: oh… are you a human?

name: azuma
normalized: yeah.
i'm kamimura azuma.

name: subordinates
normalized: i-is that k-kamimura!?
」「isn't she the one who is rumoured to be the greatest hunter in the land!?
」「the characters on her bat are in sanskrit… there is no mistaking it!

name: gram
normalized: tch…
the name of kamimura the hunter was infamous amongst all the vampiric kingdoms on the continent.
hunters were a group of individuals who specialized in hunting us, vampires, and would extend their assistance to other humans for the same.
this nation── japan, was the leading nation when it came to opposing vampires.
however, it was rumoured that, even in this nation, there was no hunter who was better than the one known as kamimura azuma.
you still haven't kicked your bad habit of going out for a stroll all alone, have you, cara?

name: cara
normalized: kitae?
it has been a while, hasn't it?
another person, a woman wearing glasses, appeared from behind the hunter.

name: gram
normalized: kitae…!?
is that the barrier-master, uehara kitae, following the hunter!?
damn it!
japan was the only nation in the world where people were trained in the art of conjuring spirit-barriers against us, vampires.
these spirit-barriers were powerful enough to obliterate us completely, if we tried to push through them forcibly.
the reason why this nation was the leading nation, when it came to opposing vampires, was because there existed entire clans trained in the art of conjuring spirit-barriers.
and this woman, uehara kitae, was the most adept conjurer of spirit-barriers in the entire world.

name: cara
normalized: you did well to find me here.

name: kitae
normalized: that is because professor kamimura was with me.
either way, i have had to come all the way here to escort you.
can't you be a bit more considerate?

name: cara
normalized: you know that i can't stand boredom, don't you?
besides, i have already told you that i don't need an escort.

name: gram
normalized: kuh… what the hell…?
it was really jarring to see the women chatting frivolously, even though they were directly in front of the eyes of their enemies.
however, there was nothing that we could do anymore, despite our numbers, now that such powerful individuals had gathered in the same place.

name: azuma
normalized: hey, miss queen.
you don't seem to be getting along with this guy too well.
since he is such an eyesore, you don't mind if i smash him up, do you?

name: cara
normalized: oh yes.
kitae, i entrust the small-fry to the both of you.
it should be easy enough for you to deal with them together.

name: azuma
normalized: you're really brazen with your words, miss queen.
the hunter readied her bat, which was shimmering with a pale-blue light.

name: azuma
normalized: hey, you guys!
i'm kamimura azuma!
you have my regards!

name: kitae
normalized: cara, i will be berating you later.
the barrier-master started drawing a pentagram, in order to conjure a spirit-barrier.

name: kitae
normalized: i won't forgive your defiance.
i, uehara kitae, will destroy you!
the hunter rushed in, with the barrier-master acting as her support.

name: kitae
normalized: professor kamimura, go ahead and obliterate them.

name: azuma
normalized: roger that!
well, i entrust my back to you, director!
the hunter rushed in, before leaping directly inside the ring of my subordinates.

name: azuma
normalized: let's go, demon slayer!
she raised the bat, known as the demon slayer, above her head──

name: azuma
normalized: dainichi nyorai, fudo myo-o, gozanze myo-o, gundari myo-o, daiitoku myo-o──
were those… the names of the wisdom kings?
(note: wisdom kings are deities in esoteric buddhism.
she began to charge it up, while reciting that mysterious incantation,
causing the sanskrit characters on her bat to start glowing with a pale light, one after another.

name: azuma
normalized: kongo-yasha myo-o, ucchusma myo-o, munosho myo-o, batou myo-o!
the incantation was complete.
all the sanskrit characters on the demon slayer were glowing with a pale light now.

name: azuma
normalized: uryaa!
silvery-blue streaks flashed out,
followed by small streaks of burning-orange near her mouth.
and then, a spray of blood surged up, as if to disperse the smoke from her cigarette.

name: subordinates
normalized: what… the hell…?
」「was that from a single strike!?
the hunter had swung the demon slayer only once, however, her strike hadn't lost any momentum whatsoever.
she had blown away the heads of a few of my brawny subordinates effortlessly.
the rumours about the abilities of kamimura the hunter seemed to be true.
my subordinates wouldn't even have gotten bruised had an ordinary human struck them with a bat.

name: azuma
normalized: come on!
what's the matter?
i'm going to end up killing you all in no time, if you're all so slow!
give it your all, you vampiric bastards!

name: kitae
normalized: there really is no need to provoke them into going all out, professor!

name: azuma
normalized: but it's way more fun that way, director.

name: kitae
normalized: don't play with them.
just finish them off quickly.

name: subordinates
normalized: finish us off!?
you dare to make light of us, despite being a mere human!?
」「you may be the hunter and the barrier-master, however, you are both nothing but women.
we will make you regret facing off against us, vampires!
my subordinates managed to regain their composure following azuma's devastating ambush, following which, they pounced on her together.

name: azuma
normalized: good!
that's the spirit.
now come and feel the rust on the demon slayer, you guys!

name: subordinates
normalized: shut up!
」「get wrecked!

name: azuma
normalized: even though you may be vampires, smashing up unarmed guys like you is going to end up spoiling my cigarette.
my subordinates closed the gap to her quickly, and swiped out at her with their sharp claws simultaneously.

name: azuma
normalized: what's with these amateurish attacks!?
the hunter roared loudly,
before brushing off all their attacks with a mere swing of the demon slayer.

name: azuma
normalized: it's unusual to see vampires get flustered like this!
even our students are better on the offensive than you lot!
take thiis!
she turned around and a streak of silver flashed out.
even though she had swung the bat with just one of her arms, she had managed to sever the head of one of my subordinates from his body.

name: subordinates
normalized: i-is this the ability of the greatest hunter in the land…!?
」「has the demon slayer been empowered with the spirits of the 9 wisdom kings!?
it is rumoured to have sucked on the blood of a thousand vampires, isn't it!?
damn it!

name: azuma
normalized: if you have spare time to run your mouths, then just attack me already!
uryaa!

name: azuma
normalized: hmph!
who's next!?
haa!
my subordinates hadn't managed to land even a single strike on her yet.
she had managed to avoid them with a twist of her heel followed by the nimble movements of her body, before brushing them off altogether with the demon slayer.
and then, she had started smashing them up relentlessly, one after another.

her combat abilities were on a completely different level to any human, as she went about severing the heads of my subordinates from their bodies at a speed which was impossible to attain for an ordinary human.
moreover, she was completely composed while doing so.
she was sneering with a bold smile etched across her face.
she was moving extremely gracefully, which didn't suit her gruff appearance at all, while pausing briefly from time to time, in order to flick the ashes off her cigarette stub.

name: cara
normalized: let them have it, azuma.
your soldiers are just too weak, aren't they?

name: gram
normalized: tch…

name: cara
normalized: i don't intend to go easy on you as well.
now then, brace yourself!

name: gram
normalized: hmph!
do you really want to face off against a monster like me!?

name: cara
normalized: we are both monsters.
i began to retreat, as if to escape the freezing stare of the queen.

name: cara
normalized: do you really think that you can escape?
her mantle transformed into the spears of the black mist, and stretched out towards me.

name: gram
normalized: aah!
i forged a sword, known as gram, in the palm of my hand in order to deal with them, while continuing my retreat.
i managed to fend off a few of the black spears, just as they approached me.
however──

name: gram
normalized: damn iit!?
their numbers were just too great.
i used my other arm like a shield, in order to block the spears which had been aimed at my heart.
as a result, my arm got skewered by numerous black spears.
moreover, i couldn't even dislodge those spears, as they were barbed.

name: cara
normalized: i am going to make you regret the fact that you made light of my powers!

name: gram
normalized: wha!?
the spears of the black mist began to twist, after having skewered my arm.
the spears undulated like a supple whip, even though they were as hard as steel.
they began to coil, before entwining themselves around my arm──

name: gram
normalized: let me go!
her spears were too swift for me to sever with my sword──

name: cara
normalized: to begin with, let me take your arm.
her icy-cold voice pierced through the silence of the night and reached my ears.

name: gram
normalized: gogyaa!?
one of my arms was ripped off.
my severed arm was sent whirling through the air, while scattering blood all over the place.

name: gram
normalized: but how can you… like this!?
i could sense my blood, as it scattered across the air.
i began to manipulate my own blood.
my blood changed its form, as if it had a will of its own, and caught my arm in mid-air.

name: cara
normalized: his regeneration speed is fast!
my blood began to draw my arm back to the place from where it had been severed.
my regeneration speed was unimaginably fast, even for a vampire──

name: cara
normalized: i won't allow you to do it!
she unleashed even more spears of the black mist.
i had been waiting for that.

name: gram
normalized: kukuku
just as those black spears converged towards me and were about to strike my head, my heart and my arms, i rose up like smoke.

name: cara
normalized: did he disappear!?
indeed.
she was bound to think that i had disappeared in that moment.
i had transformed my entire body into mist, in order to dodge her spears.
the queen tried to turn around quickly.
however, i was much faster than cara and had materialized behind her already.

name: gram
normalized: i didn't manage to bury the grim reaper, marika krishna, by merely putting on a show of my bravado!
you are the only one who could dare to make light of my powers!
i hurled my severed arm towards the queen.

name: gram
normalized: diee!
the arm, which i had hurled at cara, exploded directly in front of her.
my blood, my flesh and even my bones scattered all over the place.
all those splintered fragments transformed into tiny daggers and assaulted the queen simultaneously.

name: cara
normalized: kuh!?
all she could do was turn around.

name: gram
normalized: this is the end!
i drew gram out of my other arm,

name: gram
normalized: uhoo!
and drove it into cara, with a strike which contained all of my pent-up resentment for her.

name: gram
normalized: take this!
that should have been that.
however, not a single attack of mine had struck cara,
even though it was an assault which i had timed perfectly, and should have spelled certain death for her.

name: cara
normalized: did you really think that you could deceive me with something like that?
she said so in an exasperated voice.
i noticed one of her eyes giving me an icy-cold stare from beyond something which wasn't her mantle.

name: cara
normalized: wings of the kin.
massive wings had sprouted out of cara's back, which were reminiscent of a bat.
they had been wrapped around her entire body, similar to a cocoon, and had shielded her, like an impregnable iron wall.
they had managed to block all the attacks from my tiny daggers and even the slashing attack from my sword, gram.

name: gram
normalized: is this… the true ability of the blood lord…!?
you aren't a vampire like the rest of us, are you!?
she was a monster.
i was facing off against an actual monster.

name: gram
normalized: the fact that you could forge such a powerful shield in an instant──

name: cara
normalized: tear him to pieces, my minions!
all i heard was the swooshing sound of wind tearing through the air.

name: gram
normalized: ogooh!?
suddenly, i was dragged down to the ground forcibly.

name: gram
normalized: what… was… that…?
i noticed the after-image of a slashing blade, at the place where i had been standing,
like a dark-grey streak.
the tips of her wings, which were like blades, were reflecting the moonlight.
they were sharply-pointed sickles, similar to her spears.
her wings, which i had believed to merely be shields, were weapons as well.

name: gram
normalized: damn… it…!

name: cara
normalized: your regeneration speed… i don't know what kind of ability it was, however, you won't be able to move for a while now.
indeed.
i couldn't move my body at all.
actually, no.
the lower half of my body, which had been severed from my torso, was convulsing wildly beside me.
cara spread her massive wings majestically, before flapping them forcefully like a giant bird.

name: cara
normalized: hmph

name: gram
normalized: kuh…!?
she was smiling.
she was giving me a sneering smile,
while looking down at me with her icy-cold eyes.
it was almost as if she was ridiculing my pathetic appearance.

name: gram
normalized: you bastard…!

name: cara
normalized: i am sorry about this, uncle.
however, you did take my powers lightly.

name: gram
normalized: sh-shut uup…!
i rolled my torso over and looked away from her.

name: cara
normalized: that is how it is.
there is a heavy punishment involved in revolting against the royal family and disturbing the order!

name: gram
normalized: hmph… don't you dare make light of me… i haven't lost yet…!

name: cara
normalized: do you intend to embarrass yourself even further?

name: gram
normalized: don't underestimate me, cara.
it isn't over yet…

name: cara
normalized: hmph… even though you are a member of the royal family, i was wrong to show you a bit of mercy.

name: gram
normalized: mercy… huh?
kukuku… are you suggesting that you are going to let me be?

name: cara
normalized: no.
at least you will be dispatched by my hand.
however, that wish of yours will never come true.

name: gram
normalized: kukukuku… i am going to transform this triumphant sneering of yours into regret…!

name: cara
normalized: that time will never come.
this is where you end.

name: gram
normalized: keep on prattling!
i squirmed my torso,
and began to crawl towards the lower half of my body, which was lying on the ground after being severed.
my movements were like those of an insect, as i moved towards it pathetically, while leaving a trail of my blood and my guts behind.

name: gram
normalized: at least, let me get my legs back…
the queen had transformed her wings back to her mantle already.
she gave a suggestive look to someone who wasn't quite there──
i won't allow you do that.
a new member had come forth.
suddenly, a woman appeared out of thin air.
she was a dark-brown beauty.
so much so that she could get lost in the darkness of the night.
hah
she rushed in at full speed, with her dark-brown skin shimmering under the pale-blue light of the moon.
and then, the flesh on the palm of her hand began to squirm, just like mine, as she forged it into a massive weapon.
she grabbed a hold of its grip with both her hands and a guide-bar, akin to a massive blade, extended out of it.
a long saw-chain sprung out of the guide-bar, which had sharp serrations on it similar to the teeth of a shark.
shiva, activate.
the woman said that in a soft voice, before switching it on with the button on its grip.
the serrated edges of the chainsaw began to whirl at a high speed, while giving off a rattling sound.
as she turned the switch on, the runes, which had been etched onto the chainsaw's guide-bar, began to shimmer with the word, shiva.
the literal god of destruction.
(note: shiva is one of the principal deities in hinduism.
move it.
the woman, who was holding the exceedingly long weapon, leapt into the ring of my subordinates, who were engaged in fighting against the hunter.
the woman was so swift that my subordinates were unable to even raise their voices.
they hadn't been able to even grasp what had transpired.
she had slashed them down with the chainsaw, one after another, and they had been transformed into mere lumps of meat.

name: azuma
normalized: ah… hey!
they're my prey!
hmph
the woman glanced at the hunter, before disappearing suddenly.

name: subordinate
normalized: wha!?
she appeared in front of another one of my subordinates just as suddenly, with her massive weapon in hand.
moreover, my subordinate had already been obliterated, by being slashed from his shoulder all the way down his chest, without being allowed to move even a bit.
in that moment, the woman's figure disappeared.
immediately following which, she appeared in front of another one of my subordinates, as he attempted to read her movements.
she raised another fountain of blood by slashing through him as well, as easily as sinking a knife into a baked fish.

name: kitae
normalized: she is just as i had expected.

name: azuma
normalized: director, do you know her?

name: kitae
normalized: she is cara's escort, marika krishna.

name: marika
normalized: you are banished.
she was appearing in front of my subordinates out of thin air, before disappearing just as suddenly.
and in that fleeting moment, she was slicing through their bodies completely, including their necks, their hearts and even their skulls.
the woman was doing all that at such a high speed that her after-images could be seen lingering in front of my slaughtered subordinates.

she was transforming into mist, appearing in front of one of my subordinates and striking him down in an instant, before transforming into mist again, appearing in front of another one of my subordinates and killing him.
her attacks were similar to the one that i had carried out on cara, however, the difference in our speeds was astronomical.
even though the woman had forged such a massive weapon, her movements were so swift that it almost seemed like there were multiple versions of her doing it all simultaneously.

name: gram
normalized: marika krishna… the grim reaper!
you are still alive…!

name: marika
normalized: it is as you say.
she turned her serpentine eyes to one of my subordinates, before ripping him to shreds, and then she began to move towards me.
marika krishna── she was the leader of the order of assassin knights, which was under the command of the queen cara.
the order of assassin knights was an elite group of soldiers, and each of its members boasted a combat ability which was equivalent to 20 ordinary vampires.
it was said that marika was the most powerful among them.
so much so that she had been appointed as the queen's personal escort.
she was feared as the grim reaper, as she had managed to carry out the highest number of assassinations in the shortest period of time throughout the order's history.
i was under the assumption that my significant efforts had been enough to bury this absolute monster.
however, news had reached my ears recently informing me that she was alive.

name: gram
normalized: i didn't want to believe it, and yet…

name: azuma
normalized: hey, you!
was that meant for me!?

name: marika
normalized: well, you were in my way.
she said that in a soft yet emotionless voice, before disappearing.

name: marika
normalized: small-fry, complete.
marika had wiped out all my subordinates without even raising her voice.
all that was left was the after-image of her fluttering mantle amidst their splattered blood.
only the rattling sound of her chainsaw was audible now, as her massive blade continued to give off sparks while the runes on it shimmered with the pale light.

name: marika
normalized: it is your turn now, master gram.
she looked at me with her serpentine eyes.
immediately following which, marika's figure disappeared.

name: gram
normalized: damn iit…!
i continued to crawl over the ground desperately, while seeking my legs.

name: marika
normalized: i won't let you escape.

name: gram
normalized: whaat!?
marika appeared before my eyes and completely obliterated the lower half of my body in front of my very eyes, like the literal god of destruction.
she had ripped it up into so many tiny pieces that regenerating it was utterly impossible now.

name: gram
normalized: w-why yoou!

name: marika
normalized: even at the time of your death, you are nothing but a sore loser.

name: gram
normalized: ugooh!?
marika transformed her entire body into mist, before landing heavily on my torso.
due to that heavy impact, my spine and my ribs snapped and my internal organs got crushed.
my pathetic crawling was drawn to an abrupt halt with a mere stamp of the vampiress.

name: gram
normalized: w-why… are you alive!?
are you… immortal…!?

name: marika
normalized: just surrender.
marika pressed the blade of her chainsaw against the scruff of my neck.

name: cara
normalized: i would have been stabbed had it gone on a bit longer.
that was good timing, marika.

name: marika
normalized: miss cara, are you alright?

name: cara
normalized: apparently.
marika bowed her head to her respectfully, while standing on top of me.

name: gram
normalized: get… off me, you impertinent woman…!

name: marika
normalized: you failed with your ambush, master gram.
i am victorious this time.
surrender yourself to your death.

name: gram
normalized: guuh…
the saw-chain tore through the skin on my neck and began to rip my flesh.

name: azuma
normalized: seriously… you sucked all the fun out of this.

name: kitae
normalized: it is a good thing that this has been dealt with quickly, professor kamimura.

name: cara
normalized: i put you both through quite a lot of trouble.
azuma, your abilities are amazing, even though you are a human.

name: azuma
normalized: even though they are amazing, i couldn't even apply them properly.
this foolish chainsaw-wielding girl dispatched most of them by herself.

name: marika
normalized: mgh…

name: cara
normalized: even though she is a human, she is just as powerful as you, marika.
isn't it admirable?
cara turned her back to me and started chatting with them nonchalantly.
it seemed like they were no longer even giving me any consideration.

name: gram
normalized: you bastaard…!
damn it!
damn iit!

name: marika
normalized: tch
i forged a sword again, while hurling profanities at her, and pushed the chainsaw-wielding marika off me.
and then, i transformed my arm into mist yet again, before stretching it out towards her.
i thrust my sword at cara, who had given me a clear shot at her back.

name: kitae
normalized: what a stubborn vampire!
the barrier-master cut around to the unaware cara's backside.

name: kitae
normalized: five dragon-seal!
she raised two fingers and pointed them up──

name: kitae
normalized: black dragon!
blue dragon!
red dragon!
yellow dragon!
white dragon!
she recited the incantation of the five elements, while using her fingers to draw a dragon-seal using some mysterious aura.
water, wood, fire, earth, metal──
she drew a dragon signifying each of those elements, while reciting its corresponding chant.
she drew a pentagram, by quickly connecting them with her fingers.
and then, she completed the spirit-barrier, by connecting the five points of the pentagram in a circle.

name: kitae
normalized: dragon-seal barrier!
she raised her hand and conjured a shield-like barrier, which had a dragon drawn at each of its five corners.
my sword struck against it.

name: gram
normalized: guaah!?
my sword was repelled by the spirit-barrier, the moment it touched it.
and together with that, i experienced such an acute pain in my arm that i almost went numb.

name: gram
normalized: is that the anti-vampire barrier…!?
that is…!
i swung my arm down on her, in order to strike her with my sword from another direction.

name: kitae
normalized: you can't reach me without your sword now, can you?

name: gram
normalized: wha!?
the arm, with which i had attempted to pull off a horizontal swing, merely ended up swiping through the air.
my hand, along with the sword, had been separated from my arm at the wrist.
my wrist had been burned off, the moment i had touched the dragon-seal barrier.
only a few drops of my blood, which was spurting out of my severed arm, managed to reach her.

name: kitae
normalized: oh no!
have you soiled me!?
the barrier-master used her hands in order to wipe it off her face hurriedly.

name: cara
normalized: thank you, kitae.
i see that your skills haven't diminished at all.
your defences are as terrifying as always.

name: kitae
normalized: if you are complimenting me for defending you, then at least do so graciously.
the barrier-master dropped her guard, while continuing to wipe my blood off her face.

name: cara
normalized: marika, finish it.

name: marika
normalized: yes, miss cara.
she revved up the chainsaw and the runes, which had been etched onto its guide-bar, began to shimmer ominously as the speed of the saw-chain increased.

name: gram
normalized: guuh…
she sliced through my neck, before i could even scream out.

name: cara
normalized: be sure to kill him properly this time.

name: marika
normalized: yes.
marika said that without changing her tone even a bit, and started working diligently on dismembering me, or whatever was left of "me".
the terrifying blade, which had been empowered with a demonic force, began to give off sparks as she chopped my torso into tiny pieces, destroying my heart and my brain in the process.
i" was transformed into tiny chunks of crimson-coloured meat.
a large amount of my blood spread all over the place, like a cloud of dust, and got smeared on the surrounding ground, painting the soil crimson in the process.

name: marika
normalized: complete.

name: cara
normalized: i appreciate your efforts, marika.
the queen looked down at my lumps of meat.

name: cara
normalized: it is a proper farewell this time, uncle.
the expression on cara's face didn't change, even though she had just ordered the death of her own kin.
her eyes were icy-cold, as if she was looking down at a great sinner.

name: cara
normalized: kitae, i entrust the disposal of this man to you.

name: kitae
normalized: are you sure about that?

name: cara
normalized: yes.
burn it all to ashes.

name: kitae
normalized: understood.
kitae began to get in touch with one of her contacts.

name: azuma
normalized: by the way, how could you dare to interrupt me like that a while back?
the hunter stomped her way towards marika.
marika matched her glare, without even moving her mantle.

name: marika
normalized: you were being too slow.

name: azuma
normalized: i was just enjoying myself!

name: marika
normalized: fights should be swift.

name: azuma
normalized: fights should be fun!

name: cara
normalized: fufu… i think both your contrasting opinions have some merit.

name: azuma
normalized: it's not a laughing matter!
let's start with you!
i don't know if you're the queen of s&m or what, but you shouldn't be wandering around like this!

name: marika
normalized: how rude!
marika let out a voice teeming with anger,
while holding her massive chainsaw.

name: azuma
normalized: hehe… is that what you want to do?
very well.
the hunter readied her metal bat, while holding her cigarette between her lips.

name: kitae
normalized: it seems like these two will get along well, doesn't it?

name: cara
normalized: i believe so as well.

name: azuma & marika
normalized: i won't be so sure of that!
」「i am not too certain about that.

name: kitae
normalized: see?

name: cara
normalized: fufufu
the hunter and the grim reaper averted their eyes from each other and lowered their weapons, after being subjected to the mocking laughter of the queen and the barrier-master.

name: cara
normalized: i apologize for going for a stroll all alone on a whim.
i was bored after my long trip.

name: cara
normalized: it has been a long time since i came to japan, and i wanted to see the beloved places that i cherish so much.

name: azuma
normalized: it's just that… i didn't know that you were just out for a stroll, which is why i couldn't hold myself back.
i apologize for using insulting words.
the hunter apologized to the queen with a small whisper, while staring vaguely into the distance.

name: marika
normalized: i will be accompanying you from now on.

name: kitae
normalized: that's right, cara.
as the queen, you really need to be more vigilant.

name: cara
normalized: i know that!
marika is worrying too much already.

name: kitae
normalized: well, that is that.
let us go inside the spirit-barrier right away.
i feel like i need a bath.
the barrier-master began to walk away, while looking at the blood on her hands that she had wiped off her face.
cara looked at "me" once again.
she narrowed her eyes, as if she was focusing on something in the distance, however, the expression on her face was icy-cold, as usual.

name: kitae
normalized: the processing team will be here soon.

name: azuma
normalized: hey, let's go.
don't get lost this time.
the queen flipped her mantle over silently.
the grim reaper followed after her and the area became engulfed in a foreboding silence.
the plaza, which had been choking with the scent of those women, became silent under the pale-blue light.
there were no signs of life, as the moonlight descended into the darkness below.
it was still the time of the people of the night.
however, that silence was disturbed, as "i" began to show signs of activity.
my dark fluids, which had been smeared all over the place and had tainted the pale-blue plaza, began to pulse.
my blood pulsed, as if it was actually breathing.
it began to crawl over the ground, as if it was swimming over its surface, and accumulated at the spot where my squirming, crimson-coloured meat was located.
it ended up forming a pool of blood.

name: gram
normalized: … i am… back…
i said that in a miserably distorted voice, as if it was coming out of a broken radio.
it was difficult to talk, now that i had lost my body.
however, my subordinate responded to my voice.
a man stepped out of the darkness and into the light, before bowing down to me respectfully.

name: subordinate
normalized: master gram, are you alright?
the blood on the ground began to wave.

name: gram
normalized: … i am dead… however, i am alright…
numerous ripples appeared in the pool of blood and overlapped each other,
as if countless fish were swimming within it.
an ear-piercing screech echoed out from within my dark fluids.
that buzzing screech was their cry.

name: subordinate
normalized: did you succeed?

name: gram
normalized: … kuku… the queen's power was more than what i had anticipated… and marika krishna is alive as well… which was a surprise… considering all that… it was quite a good performance…

name: subordinate
normalized: fufu… well then, let us go ahead with the plan.

name: gram
normalized: i did entrust it… to you.
kukuku… i am going to enjoy myself… from now on…
a strange buzzing noise, like an irritable shriek, echoed out from the chunks of my meat.
and with that, the pool of my blood, which was shimmering under the moonlight, began to swell vigorously.

name: gram
normalized: … were you able… to carry out my order…?

name: subordinate
normalized: yeah.
come here.
my subordinate, who had a led a man here, pointed to a spot and made him stand there.
the man was wearing a suit and had a physique which was almost similar to mine.
the suited man, who had been robbed of his mind, merely stood there without doing anything, with a blank expression on his face.

name: subordinate
normalized: our collaborator on their side set him up for us.
he is a teacher, yamakawa yoshiki.

name: gram
normalized: … excellent.
so, i will be known to them as… yamakawa yoshiki… kukukuku!
my subordinate dissolved into the darkness.
immediately following which, "i" swelled up like a massive wave.
the small pool of my blood, which was crawling over the ground, became massive, like a tsunami.
i began to devour the suited man, yamakawa, even as he stood in front of me.
the surging wave of my blood swallowed up all of yamakawa, from his head all the way down to his feet.
